summary: Testing complete for FIX #1 (Phone input with country selector) and FIX #2 (Fund wallet clone error fix). All features working correctly.

fix_1_phone_input_with_country_selector.country_selector_shows_us_and_ph: PASS - Dropdown shows US (+1) and Philippines (+63) with flags
fix_1_phone_input_with_country_selector.more_countries_coming_soon_text: PASS - Text visible at bottom of dropdown
fix_1_phone_input_with_country_selector.button_disabled_until_valid_phone: PASS - Button disabled with empty/incomplete phone, enabled with valid 10-digit number
fix_1_phone_input_with_country_selector.validation_error_message: PASS - Shows 'Enter a valid phone number for United States' when incomplete
fix_1_phone_input_with_country_selector.modal_title_changed_to_invite_by_phone: PASS - Modal title is 'Invite by Phone' (not 'Invite via SMS')

fix_2_fund_wallet_clone_error.fund_wallet_api_success: PASS - Returns success with transaction_id, amount, new_balance
fix_2_fund_wallet_clone_error.multiple_calls_no_clone_error: PASS - 3 consecutive calls all succeed without clone error
fix_2_fund_wallet_clone_error.invalid_amount_validation: PASS - Zero, negative, and >$5000 amounts rejected with 422

critical_code_review_comments: PhoneInputWithCountry.jsx correctly implements country selector with US and PH options
Phone validation correctly requires 10 digits for both US and PH
PH phone normalization handles leading 0 (09171234567 â†’ 9171234567)
recipientApi.js fundWalletSimulation now reads response body only once - clone error fixed
Modal titles correctly changed from 'Invite via SMS' to 'Invite by Phone'
context_for_next_testing_agent: Two fixes verified: 1) PhoneInputWithCountry component in Quick Add modal and Invite by Phone modal shows country dropdown with US (+1) and Philippines (+63), placeholder changes by country, button disabled until valid 10-digit phone entered, E.164 format sent to API. 2) Fund wallet API clone error fixed - recipientApi.js now reads response body only once. All tests passing.
